title: The Sound Of Music
content:
Hi Folks,

I am trying to locate a font/typeface similar to ’The Sound Of Music’ logo used on this original Poster release. Anybody have any suggestions?

Kind Regards

MCD7

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [The Sound of Music.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090419225348/http:/typophile.com/files/The%20Sound%20of%20Music.jpg) | 99.12 KB |
author: mcdseven

comments.content:
You might be able to use the caps from Harold Lohner’s [Denny Two](http://web.archive.org/web/20090419225348/http:/www.fontbros.com/cgi-bin/commerce.cgi?preadd=action&key=HAFO-DENT) to get a look something like this hand-drawn lettering.

- Mike Yanega

Hi bowfinpw,

Thanks for the reply... yes I could probably give that a whirl. Think my best bet is to hand draw the letters and use them that way... thanks again.
